title: Dreadnova Darius is missing particle effects on recall
body: Not anything game breaking, but one of the many reasons I spent a lot of money on this skin is for those chainsaw axe crazy effects and since the latest patch they are no longer visible when you recall ( his axe and jetpack) his W effects are ok though. I ask @SkinTeam to fix this if possible

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

In the process of working on a fix. Thanks for the report. <3

**EDIT**: This appears to be a bit more in depth than, 'hey the VFX fell off'. Some weirdness is going on, buuuut we're still digging.

wow thanks <3

The image with name "1" contains within it an image of a minion. 
The darkly transparent center circle is the hitbox of a melee minion. 
The green ring is the mele minions auto attack range. 
The desert yellow ring is the melee minion acquisition range. 

https://imgur.com/70xYZuO

Inside League of Legends 
given a source unit's hitbox and a target unit's hitbox, 
range is calculated as follows: 
autoattack range from edge to edge; 
targeted skill range from center to center; 
skillshot range from edge to edge; 
and the range of self-centered area of effects are from the edge of the source

In order to generate functionally useful generalizations 
as guides for behaviour, used for pattern recognition,
a human being must know the specific visual representations 
of involved hitboxes, a person must know how exactly 
the hitbox functionally looks like in the game.

Inside image "2" is a screenshot taken from "dignitas" homepage. 
It supposedly shows that there are 3 default sizes of champion 
hitboxes in LoL, further altered by consumable effects and other effects. 

https://imgur.com/a/HaORZ

Can you supply an actual assortment of screenshots taken from 
"testing client", just like the "1" image is, in a way so that those 
new screen shots would show how exactly the
hitbox & AA range of a:
caster minion;
cannon minion; 
small sized champion;
medium sized champion; 
large sized champion; 
tower; 

look like and are represented on the game terrain, along with a listed division of champions belonging to small, medium and large categories, or in relation to champions just screenshot every champion due to differences in ranges of AA. 



Also can there be a clarification about targeting icons? 

In image "3" we can supposedly see the hitbox of ziggz Q. 
Question 1 - Is the area from the center point of the hitbox outwards 
towards the first inner brightly blue ring, with whom the spokes for 
centering are connected to, is the effective hitbox of Ziggz Q, and then 
the "pipe area" which has those 8 marks in it shows the are which is not 
the damadge hitbox of zigz Q? 
Or is the entire area of the out-most circle, used for targeting the Q, the effective hitbox 
of ziggz Q? 

https://imgur.com/j0p455W

In image '4' is shown the supposed auto attack range of ziggz. 
The question is - is the entire highlighted area including the bright blue outline 
the range of ziggz auto attack?
Or is the bright blue outline highlighting the limits of and the area that dose not 
belong to ziggz auto attack range? 

Note that image 4 dose not show the actual visuals of hit boxes involved. 

https://imgur.com/62hgBoh

It would also be nice if representations of unit hitboxes, and map markers, and 
unit calculator and unit indexes would be added to the practice tool, it would allow 
to specifically test for these elements.
